categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Bobby was a male Human Jedi Initiate studying with the Jedi Order during the final decade of the Galactic Republic.

A Force-sensitive Human, Bobby received his training in the ways of the Force from the Jedi Order at their Coruscant Temple. Placed into the Mighty Bear Clan, a clan of Initiates noted for their bravery, Bobby received direct training from the clan's minder, Grand Master Yoda.

Bobby first appeared in the junior novelization of Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones. He later appeared in the non-canon TV special LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace. He became a main character in the TV special series called LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles for the first season as he made his last appearance in the Yoda Chronicles series season two episode one Escape from the Jedi Temple.
